abstract: Juliet Macur Sports of The Times column supports Iran's repeal of law banning women from attending volleyball matches; says if women are not allowed to attend upcoming World League matches in Tehran, country should not be allowed to host further international volleyball events; describes recent instance of women being refused entry to matches on Kish Island.
lead_paragraph: If Iran cannot follow international standards for equality, then it should not be awarded international sporting events, like the one this week on Kish Island.

headline.main: Women Denied Entry to Volleyball Event: That’s the Real Crime
headline.print_headline: Inequality in the Stands Taints an International Sport

snippet: If Iran cannot follow international standards for equality, then it should not be awarded international sporting events, like the one this week on Kish Island.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
